website_summaries.verdict: The steam and rinse basket on this model has small slats designed to allow you to use it to rinse the rice.
pros: Large capacity of seven uncooked cups
Has pre-programmed settings for beans, brown rice, or other grains
Does a great job steaming vegetables
cons: Unit expels a lot of steam while in use

customer_reviews.title: Great rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: Great rice cooker! We've used this almost everyday since it arrived a few weeks ago. We've cooked both white and brown rice, and both have turned out well. My favorite feature is the warmer after the rice cooks, so if the other parts of the meal aren't finished yet, the rice stays warn without getting dried out or burnt.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper_Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. Inner lid breaks off from outer lid and ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Inner lid breaks off from outer lid and requires a knife to forcibly pry it off the cooker. Over flows and spills everywhere. Takes 45 minutes to cook rice. Truly a terrible, terrible product. In desperately miss my old rice cooker and regret not trying this before the refund period. There has to be something better.
customer_reviews.author: Zebov

customer_reviews.title: Can not cook meat.  Very limited functions.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a unit for a novice cook. It really does not cook much more than rice. And you can easily cook rice yourself on the stove. The instructions are so complex and uses so limited, it discourages use. Once cooking starts, you can not make any changes. I tried to cook chicken but it did not work. It takes up so much counter space for something with such lack of versitility.
customer_reviews.author: Iharteddie

customer_reviews.title: Rice Glue Maker
customer_reviews.text: You have REALLY got to hate washing a saucepan to use this cooker instead to cook rice. Tried various types of rice and grain size, multiple times. Measured rice and water very carefully. Turned out like glue EVERY time. In addition, the unit does not indicate when the cooker has transitioned from cooking to the warm cycle. So you literally have to be standing there when it finishes cooking, or it goes to the warm cycle and proceeds to roast to a hard brown rice cake any rice that is touching the surface of the cooking pot ("patina" as those who can't bring themselves to level the rice "burned" call it).
customer_reviews.author: ALG

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and still going strong
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this rice cooker about twice a week since we bought it. My only disappointment is when you try to steam vegetables or cook meat while the rice is cooking the steam tray is fairly shallow. I have a big family (7 of us total) and we make about 3-4 cups to supplement dinners. It is reliable and easy to clean. The inner tray is labeled to help you measure correctly. The scoop is a 3/4 cup so if you ever lose it just remember for the future so your rice to water ratio isn’t wrong. Rice is always moist (doesn’t make a dry rice).
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Linder

customer_reviews.title: My Filipina wife LOVES this rice cooker!
customer_reviews.text: My wife is Filipina. She tells me that rice is a must if you are Filipino...lol. She uses this thing about every other day and she loves it. It cooks rice to perfection, and this leaves you to go do other things. I like the fact that it adjusts itself once the cooking is done, so that the rice stays near perfect on warm until it is time to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: It’s good. First time buying a rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: I’ve nwver really cooked on my own before so this was a nice beginners experience. I’m going to return it in a few days because the price vs versatility of this tool isn’t really a even ratio. I guess I’m ready to move up onto cooking rice the traditional way. If you live in a college dorm or small living space, I guess I would rocommend this along with your Ramen Noodle Cups. Lol ^^ But, do look into Rice topping flavoring spices because, this machine left my fluffy rice rather bland. :’/
customer_reviews.author: Munchkin

customer_reviews.title: Cooks rice just fine. But
customer_reviews.text: Cooks rice just fine. But.... there is a considerable "baked on mess" on the underside of the lid when cooking cycle is finished. It is VERY difficult to clean off this mess, and much of the mess ends up in the vent holes in this area. I would not recommend based on disappointing cleaning chore.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy rice cooking
customer_reviews.text: Product works as expected and makes rice cooking much easier. I've cooked some of my best rice with it. Very easy to clean and I'm so happy to be done with scraping burnt rice out of pots and pans. I love it overall but I've had some minor issues. The silicone around the lid stains when simmering tomato based sauces like chili. The beeps when pressing buttons are very loud and I can't find a way to adjust the volume (if there is one).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Takes as long as stove top cooking.
customer_reviews.text: Takes just so long to cook rice as it does on a stove top. I've cook white rice, brown rice, stream veggies. Still, no faster than stove top method. A matter of fact it didn't cook my brown rice but partially. After an hour I had transfer it to the a pot and continue cooking it on the stove top. Yes, I've had rice cookers and streamers in the past. This was a replacement to a black decker, yet, it is a little disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Divinia

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother.
customer_reviews.text: This thing spit water out of the stem hole in the top. It was all over my counter and the floor! Then it left a rice/water coating all over everything, including the cooker itself. Because of all the water it spit out, the rice was super dry. I only made half of the amount of rice that the cooker is able to make. Returning this!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Rice Is Nice
customer_reviews.text: I used it to to make rice and it made some of the best rice I've ever had. I am still using it today. I used it to make quinoa and regular rice and brown rice. I will say though the one thing I Don't really like about it is how inefficient it is to clean it. The pot inside is easy because you take it out ,and same goes for the top piece as well, but there's a section once you pull that off that has kind of grime in it and I can pull the plastic abit and scrub but it's still tough to reach. Aside from that it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Romero

customer_reviews.title: I'm pretty happy. My brown rice does burn a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this steamer for a couple of months now and overall, I'm pretty happy. My brown rice does burn a bit on the bottom and I've tried multiple levels of water/broth and still can't seem to avoid the burn. ***If you are planning to cook steel cut "Irish Style" oatmeal, cook it without the internal lid to avoid the splattering oat goo that bubbles from the top. I accidentally forgot to cook with it one morning and it cooked perfectly! I'm not joking, the best oatmeal I've ever had, and NO MESS!***
customer_reviews.author: Sir Loin

customer_reviews.title: Defective and leaky and messy.
customer_reviews.text: Defective from the first use out of the box. Spills water out the vent hole to the point where it makes a huge mess. Yes I am using properly. I have 2 others of the same item and neither of those 2 operate like this under same conditions.
customer_reviews.author: B.C.

customer_reviews.title: Really like this cooker
customer_reviews.text: Been using this cooker for almost 2 years now, and it still works really well. Make sure you don't lose the instructions (or take pictures of them so you have a digital copy) since learning how to cook a different type of rice may be confusing if you've been cooking one type most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: worth it
customer_reviews.text: Out of all honesty -- we always owned rice cookers that cost $200+ (the bull brand or the jinshiro?) but they dont seem to last. We prob cook rice once a day and maybe a year or 2 they seem to die. I feel much more comfortable buying these "cheaper" brands and if they break they break. I could buy 3-4 of these for the price of the ones my parent normally gets. To me, the rice isn't all that different. Yes its a little fluffier BUT it really doesnt make that much difference for me
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie La

customer_reviews.title: will cook almost anything
customer_reviews.text: works perfect as advertised, and very easy to clean and use, i bought to do ALL my cooking due i have dementia and cant be trusted to use the stove/oven anymore, the programmable feature allows me to set a cooking time and it turns off completely when done, so far have cooked perfect hamburgers in it, they dont brown but so juicy and favorable this way, even melts cheese on top to perfection, cooked bacon and hard boiled eggs for breakfast in 8 minutes, so versatile will cook anything (just doesnt brown like frying or baking) - love this cooker and very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Michael K.

customer_reviews.title: Works good and easy
customer_reviews.text: I like the little cup that catches the condensation off the lid as you open it, so it doesn't roll back into the pot and make the rice soggy. Works great for all kinds of rice. I make lentils in it too.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie Balidoy

customer_reviews.title: Great rice cooker!
customer_reviews.text: This couldn't have been any easier to use. I have close to zero culinary skills and used this for the first time the other day. Filled the provided cup with rice 6x and put it in the pot. Filled the pot to the #6 line. Pressed the "Select Mode" button once to put it on white rice (for my white Jasmine rice). It automatically started cooking 5 seconds later and beeped once it was done in 45 minutes. The rice came out perfectly. Have not tried other types of rice with it yet, but this turned out better than any other experiments I've had in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: OK rice cooker, total fail with oatmeal
customer_reviews.text: Fine as a rice cooker, absymal failure at cooking oatmeal. As others have experienced, it leaked badly and made a huge mess to clean...and nothing edible for the trouble. So if you're buying this to make rice, it seems OK. If you really, really want to cook oatmeal in it, too, you probably should look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Daven60

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful. Perfect Rice EVERY Time.
customer_reviews.text: We eat rice much more often, now (despite the carbs). Perfect, fluffy rice, regardless of brand. Slow to steam, but worth the wait (about an hour),.
customer_reviews.author: Laura P.

customer_reviews.title: How to cook great rice
customer_reviews.text: Takes about three (3) times using this cooker to understand how it really works. Too hard, too moist, not cooked long enough... you will understand this cooker by three try’s. Once conquered, the rice is great... especially Jasmine!
customer_reviews.author: Lumdor

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: We expected a lot and thought this could fit 14 cups of rice. But, when it came it was small so it was kind of a disappointment but it’s okay because we will just give it to someone.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great Cooker.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little rice cooker. It also is great for beans and other grains. I use it weekly.
customer_reviews.author: Alan P.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Rice gets really brown and crispy on the bottom if you're only making 1-2 cups
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: Directions are very poor..
customer_reviews.text: Directions are very poor.... Haven't been able to figure out equations to get decent rice... booklet that came with it doesn't make sense & neither do the markings on the side of the insert.... large booklet, but it is in 4 different languages, so actually not many directions at all
customer_reviews.author: Michele J. Steinbacher

customer_reviews.title: Great rice cooker jest
customer_reviews.text: First time using the Hamilton band for rice cooker. I'm very pleased with the cooker. It is s bit too slow since it cooked rice in 37mins but it Also comes with quick Rice feature. overall is a great product just be aware that takes a bit long to do its job.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Cooking time is a bit odd to figure out
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I feel is difficult is that the steamer keeps readjusting time to cook based on what is inside, so it takes quite a few times of using before you are really sure of how long various amounts of rice will take to cook.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy B. Stoliker

customer_reviews.title: While it does a great job with various grains/rice
customer_reviews.text: This device is incredible! While it does a great job with various grains/rice, it's even better with Oatmeal. I don't think I've gone a single day without using it since I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Wilfredo Martinez

customer_reviews.title: I like the features but do not like that it "crisps" ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the features but do not like that it "crisps" the bottom of everything I cook. I follow the directions carefully. Rice, oatmeal...all crisp. What is up with that?
customer_reviews.author: Read2Enjoy

customer_reviews.title: it's amazing! I don't know how I lived without one
customer_reviews.text: My first rice cooker, and to be honest, it takes a bit of getting used to. But once you figure it out, it's amazing! I don't know how I lived without one.
customer_reviews.author: David H

customer_reviews.title: Cooks all things rice.  Really well!
customer_reviews.text: I had a really old rice and vegetable steamer I used for 15 years. I broke down and bought this. I wish I could have got this 15 years ago. Does an excellent job with rice but I use it to make rice side dishes. I use it for red bean and rice packages. I use it for flavored rice packages. Any boxed rice dish that cooks on the stove, I put in here and it does excellent job cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Jason MacArthur

customer_reviews.title: Teflon coating comes off
customer_reviews.text: I've had this rice cooker for almost a year and it has worked great as a rice cooker. Much like I now see from other reviewers, however, the teflon coating has began to flake off. We are always careful to use plastic or bamboo rice paddles and never use metal utensils since we didn't want to harm the coating. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Collins

customer_reviews.title: Stay away!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so disappointed in this rice maker. I had a cheap $10 Black & Decker that made perfect rice. I was devastated when it finally bit the dust. My wife and I eat rice probably 3x week, if not more, so I decided to get an upgraded version with all the bells and whistles. Unfortunately, the only thing consistent about this rice maker is the rice on the bottom being burnt to the bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: The cheap buyer always pays the most, in the end.
customer_reviews.text: Worked OK - not great, but serviceable - for about six months. Then the temperature regulation failed. Now it boils over, making a mess all over the counter, and toasts the rice at the bottom of the bowl to a crisp. Bite the bullet and spend the money for a Zojirushi instead.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Einolf

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I got this rice cooker few months ago and have used it quite a few times. But it is not part of daily routine. I wanted to use it last night after not using it about 14 days but to my dismay, it does not seem to work. It just would not start. I was expecting more than this.
customer_reviews.author: 123djdunx

customer_reviews.title: I contacted customer service and they were nice enough to offer to send me a new one
customer_reviews.text: Display is broken after 5 months of light usage (see photos). I contacted customer service and they were nice enough to offer to send me a new one. Normally, you would have to pay the return shipping and send the product back to them, which seems like a huge hassle, so just be wary of that. Otherwise, it does a fine job of cooking rice. Nothing too special as far as I can tell.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan

customer_reviews.title: It seems to work great for him and he loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son and he uses it every week. It seems to work great for him and he loves it. Personally, I just cook my rice the old fashioned way in a pan on the stove, but to each their own. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: KansasMom

customer_reviews.title: Short Life Span
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with this product until it stopped working after no more than 10 uses. It turns on but does not cook the rice. The timer counts down from 45 minutes to 8 minutes then just stops there. When I opened the cooker the rice was completely uncooked. I tried several times but it is dead.
customer_reviews.author: TwinOhBoys!

customer_reviews.title: Broke the 3rd time I used it.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed. I have used this rice cooker 3x since I purchased it & it no longer works. I plug it in, all the lights come on & then it shuts itself off. I have tried everything to get it to work. I wish I had used it more & it would have broken while still under warranty. Do not buy this product. It is not worth it & is a lot smaller than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Burns

customer_reviews.title: Love this rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after my 20 year old Oster fell off my counter and broke. I love this rice cooker. I have not tried to cook cereal or steam anything, but it does a great job cooking medium grain rice.
customer_reviews.author: momof5boys

customer_reviews.title: 😍
customer_reviews.text: Love this little gadget. I haven't used it for rice yet but i cook all of my hot cereals in it. Its perfect, just set it to go add ingredients and🍲✔
customer_reviews.author: My

customer_reviews.title: User error of course but I'll keep at it because overall I like it!
customer_reviews.text: Wife's review-Packaged well, crafted well, tried to make brown basmati rice in it for the first time and I scorched it a bit. User error of course but I'll keep at it because overall I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Chip Wilmore

customer_reviews.title: Makes more healthy meals easier, and clean up a snap!
customer_reviews.text: This does rice perfectly! I am still experimenting. I just made oatmeal with fresh (but precooked in microwave partially) apples, cinnamon, and brown sugar instead of white sugar. Came out awesome! Was not mushy, burned, or clumpy.
customer_reviews.author: Tina L

customer_reviews.title: Do what commit
customer_reviews.text: It is not real product and do what commit , not like other “Pot” product.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: So much more than expected
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite household items. I purchased it mainly for rice however I use it more to have a warm breakfast waiting for me. Perfect for presetting and waking to hot perfect oatmeal. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Loyal to a fault

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this, my first rice cooker ever... LOVE it. Perfect rice in 45 minutes! I have no complaints whatsoever (at least so far). Just one thing, I have to remember to make sure the lid is fully closed before I start the process, but even this isn't an issue because when I didn't secure it and didn't notice 'til the end, the rice still came out perfect. Weird and cool.
customer_reviews.author: Kahena

customer_reviews.title: Good for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Good for what it is, makes perfect rice every time, but I would save your money for an instant pot that can do much more.
customer_reviews.author: Hotdog

customer_reviews.title: Cooked rice is not a true 7 cups. Its half that.
customer_reviews.text: False advertisement of how many cups of rice is cooked. Its Probably a great rice cooker, however the measuring cup provided is not a True Cup its about 1/2 cup which means only 3 1/2 cup cooked rice. It advertises as 7 cups cooked rice but its not a true 7 cups! It will probably yield about 3 1/2.
customer_reviews.author: JayTac

customer_reviews.title: Easy to maintain and use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean. Like that the inside of top is removable for easy clean. Comes with everything mentioned
customer_reviews.author: marvin chavez

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! So far I've only made rolled oats, but love the ease of use. Easy clean up. Love the keep warm feature. The directions are confusing, the measurements not accurate for recipe cooking. I ignored them and went by full cup measures and it worked out fine.
customer_reviews.author: crisscross

customer_reviews.title: I cant turn on a light switch and this was easy
customer_reviews.text: Use it as often as I can, buy it, so easy and 100%reliable
customer_reviews.author: Alby Maccarone Jr

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Likey likey..no issues. Recommend covering vents with tape after use to keep out any little critters😬
customer_reviews.author: Deezo

customer_reviews.title: useful,while the plastic parts are easy to crash
customer_reviews.text: fits 5 person family;the side cap is crashed less than 5months,do you have anyreplacement for that
customer_reviews.author: mindy

customer_reviews.title: I doesn’t look brand new!
customer_reviews.text: So i just received this rice cooker today and was excited to use it but the moment i iopened the box i got so dissapointed because there’s dust on top of it, on the bottom and it doesn’t look like brandnew! This is a refurbished item! C’mon!
customer_reviews.author: robert dalida

customer_reviews.title: Used it several times & really like it so far
customer_reviews.text: Used it several times & really like it so far. When cooking rice it seems like it cooks a lot faster than advertised, so you might want to keep an eye on it until you get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Cash Fan

customer_reviews.title: Cook Brown rice often and have yet to be disappointed. The product works exactly like it's suppose to
customer_reviews.text: Cook Brown rice often and have yet to be disappointed. The product works exactly like it's suppose to. Very Happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon CustomerLEO

customer_reviews.title: ... hot cereal feature works really well and everything runs like I have come to expect from this brand
customer_reviews.text: The hot cereal feature works really well and everything runs like I have come to expect from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: magicneko

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad product for SMALL family size meals
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item because I had one before, unfortunately this is the smaller version. It takes much longer to cook than the larger version, yet it is perfect for our family of 3
customer_reviews.author: MIA305 SM

customer_reviews.title: works well, makes great rice.
customer_reviews.text: works well and lasts so far. asdd some salt tot he water when cooking and do not place under cabinets when using. Steam could be an issue with wood work.
customer_reviews.author: Harold M. Belbin

customer_reviews.title: Love all the different settings
customer_reviews.text: Love all the different settings, and love that the measuring cup fits perfectly inside the cooker. I had another rice cooker before this and the measuring cup didn't fit inside of it, so it was hard keeping everything all together.
customer_reviews.author: Hanah Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: I use this daily
customer_reviews.text: Use it for my hot oatmeal every morning. Cooks rice perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Norbert Neel

customer_reviews.title: Good material
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, works fine, a lot of settings. Using since last two years.
customer_reviews.author: Sanjay

customer_reviews.title: I love the ability to have a delay start time for ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the ability to have a delay start time for hot cereal in the morning. My son loves it. He sets it to steam his food so it is hot and ready when he leaves the gym. Easy to clean and works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Edith schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Totally in love with this thing
customer_reviews.text: How did I ever cook rice without this little machine!? Life altering purchase! Totally in love with this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Ron Heffner

customer_reviews.title: AMAZINg- so good I bought 2 one for me and one for ...
customer_reviews.text: AMAZINg- so good I bought 2 one for me and one for my oldest daughter who also loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Tony's wifey :-)

customer_reviews.title: Not for Brown rice or Quinoa
customer_reviews.text: For white rice it's ideal only Very slow for others options
customer_reviews.author: dane s.

customer_reviews.title: No longer cooks properly
customer_reviews.text: Have used it about 10 times now and it no longer cooks my rice properly. My rice comes out watery even though I've been doing the same setup as always. This is quite irritating as i haven't even used it that much and is no longer functioning properly. Would not buy any brand from this company again considering how quickly it stopped functioning.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: I eat rice pretty much everyday and this delivers! Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Diego Loaiza

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy my own after always asking my roommate to use his. I was so excited until I tried to cook rice for the 1st time on the 1 I bought and found out it was broken. So disappointed and upset at the waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy to work
customer_reviews.text: So far I am loving this!! Good quality and easy to work.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: got it for a friend, she likes it a lot. it is smaller than seem on photos.
customer_reviews.author: MeowGurl

customer_reviews.title: Non stick coating came off within 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two of them and the non stick coating started coming off within 2 months of daily use for both of them. I hand washed them with sponge or soft paper towel but still doesn't help. You get what you paid for.
customer_reviews.author: QQK

customer_reviews.title: Great cooker for the price
customer_reviews.text: Trying to steam something and cook rice at the same time can be an interesting experience, but other than that, this rice cooker is the best one I've had. It is easily cleaned, and does pretty much everything itself. Worth it, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: excellent rice cooker for the price
customer_reviews.text: works great. easy to use. simple to clean and maintain
customer_reviews.author: Deepak Gudimallam

customer_reviews.title: Great Rice cooker/steamer
customer_reviews.text: Love it...mainly steam cook rice but it works as advertised. Best bang for the buck ...........
customer_reviews.author: Mav2Knight

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s always being used in my house and I love it. Just wish it came with a spoon.
customer_reviews.author: Adderall

customer_reviews.title: Made my life so much easier!!! I ...
customer_reviews.text: Made my life so much easier!!! I can cook rice on the bottom while my veggies get steamed on the top tray!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Silva

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fluffy rice cooker!
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy! Put the rice n water in turn it on and voila- Perfect fluffy rice every time! Never sticky!
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Grace

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as cooked rice directly from the stove
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as cooked rice directly from the stove.. it's a little sticky (basmati rice that's supposed to be light and fluffy). You have to utilize the included cup to measure the rice, it's a smaller cut than traditional measuring cup. Very convenient!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and reliable. Great cooker/steamer.
customer_reviews.text: loving this cooker, rice comes out perfectly everytime. so simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lord Mitovius

customer_reviews.title: Liked it
customer_reviews.text: The rice is cooked pretty good, the time is also pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Zeyun

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it works great family of six we love it
customer_reviews.author: kv

customer_reviews.title: Dependable and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Have been using constantly for nine months since going Vegan. Dependable and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why rice is so difficult for me to make but with this it's perfect every single time. It's great for steaming vegetables too.
customer_reviews.author: Miss M

customer_reviews.title: Its very good I have no idea why any of these people ...
customer_reviews.text: Its very good I have no idea why any of these people give it less than 5 stars. I use it to cook rice. beans, lentils, chicken etc and it gets the job done perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Reginald

customer_reviews.title: It works better than we expected. Lots of choices for different types of rice.
customer_reviews.text: It works better than we expected. Lots of choices for different types of rice.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Legit rice cooker
customer_reviews.text: Ok.. this rice cooker is legit.. for sure it will cook your rice quick and delicious.. definitely recommending it
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Tran

customer_reviews.title: Makes Anyone a Gourmet Cook
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my Instant Pot! I've used it a handful of times now and each meal made was a hit with the family. Purchased a cookbook at the same time, but that was not necessary. Many recipes available online for free.
customer_reviews.author: K Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! A rice cooker that also perfectly cooks hot cereals like Irish steelcut oats! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a rice cooker and saw a low cost one, which got bad reviews. This one was further down the page in the recommended alternatives. When I saw that it also cooks hot cereal, my eyes almost bulged out of my head - lol. I make Irish steelcut oats in it and rice and they cook perfectly. Very easy to use and convenient. Also easy to clean and keep clean. It's the only thing I hand wash. I have a special affinity for this rice cooker. :) Everything else goes in the dishwasher. :)

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach Digital Programmable Rice Cooker & Food Steamer, 14 Cups Cooked (7 Uncooked) With Steam & Rinse Basket, Stainless Steel (37548)
product_meta.description: Color:Stainless SteelMaking a complete and balanced meal in the Hamilton Beach Electric Rice Cooker & Food Steamer is as easy as placing the ingredients in the bowl and turning it on. Not only does it cook rice and whole grains perfectly, but an integrated basket can be used to steam seafood, poultry and vegetables even while the rice cooks below. That means with just a few presses of a button, it’s quick and easy to serve salmon with kale and quinoa one night and chicken and broccoli over white rice the next. The 2-in-1 steamer basket can also be used to rinse grains before cooking, which prevents clumping and results in a fresher taste. Clean up is a snap with the dishwasher safe nonstick cooking pot. Its compact size makes for easy storage. Cooking healthy, delicious meals doesn’t get any simpler than that. Do not place on or near a hot gas or an electric burner, or in a heated oven.
feature_bullets: 2-In-1 rice rinser/steam basket: Rice cooker includes steam basket that doubles as a rice rinser makes it easy to rinse rice before cooking to prevent clumping.
Versatile capacity: The rice/hot cereal cooker makes 2–14 cups of cooked rices and grains, hot cereals, steamed vegetables, and more.

Preprogrammed settings: Six different settings on this rice/hot cereal cooker take the guesswork out of cooking. Choose from white rice, quick rice, whole grain, heat/simmer, steam cook, and hot cereals.
One-Pot cooking: Steam seafood, poultry, or vegetables in the steam basket while the rice cooks or use the heat/simmer setting to make your own soups, beans, or flavored pasta mixes.
Make meal planning easier: The delay start feature on rice cooker lets you program cooking up to 11 hours in advance. Automatically shifts to warm setting after cooking to keep food ready to serve.
